name: Login
steps: Navigate to the url and Check if login page is visible and Enter the ID in User ID filed and password in password field and click on Submit Button
expected: User should be able to login successfully

name: Add Test Case
description: click on add button to add the test case
steps: click on add button and click on submit and verify if details are added

name: Edit Test Case
description: click on edit button to update the test case
steps: click on edit button, update the fields and click on submit

name: Delete Test Case
description: click on delete button to delete the test case
steps: click on delete button of the respective test case row

name: Cancel Test Case
description: click on cancel button to cancel the test case
steps: click on cancel button to cancel the inprogress updation/addition of testcase
